initializeGame() - Method in class com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGGame
This method is used to set initial values for the current game: 1) Set the number of armies for a player in the Setup Phase 2) Allocate zero cards for every player.

This method is used to create positions 7, 8, 9, 10 in players' data structure to store the actions performed by players during play time
